actions.committee: House Committee on Science and Technology
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Science and Technology.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use or expenditures of Federal funds for the publication or dissemination of weather information in terms of the metric systems without a specific authorization by the Congress for such use or expenditure.

summary.text: Prohibits the expenditure of Federal funds to publish or disseminate any data relating to weather conditions which includes certain measurements in terms of the metric system, unless specifically authorized by Congress.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use or expenditures of Federal funds for the publication or dissemination of weather information in terms of the metric systems without a specific authorization by the Congress for such use or expenditure.
